const CartPopup = (props) => { const { cartPopup, toggleCartPopup, cartItems, tableRows, checkout, isCartEmpty } = props; return ( <> {cartPopup &&(

Car Rental Center

{!cartItems || cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : (
{tableRows}
Image Name Price Per Day Reservation Days Action
)}
)} ) } export default CartPopup;
